text: 18:2: Isa 13:21; 21:9; Jer 50:39; 51:8; Phong 14:8 Aduga mahakna ahouba khonjelda laorak-i: â€œMahak ture! Achouba Babylon ture! Mahak houjikti lai phattabasing amadi sengdaba thawaisinggi kaidongpham oire, aduga amotpa makhal pumnamakna amadi tukkachaningai oiraba ucheksingna mangonda leire.
